speaker: Doctor
text: Good morning, Mrs. Thompson. How have you been feeling since we adjusted your medications?

speaker: Patient
text: Good morning, Doctor. I've been feeling a bit better, but I still get tired easily.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's understandable. With your heart condition, fatigue can be common. How are you managing with the furosemide?

speaker: Patient
text: I think it's helping with the swelling, but I have to go to the bathroom quite often.

speaker: Doctor
text: Frequent urination is a known side effect. We can consider adjusting the timing of your dose. Are you taking it in the morning?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, I take it in the morning as you suggested. It helps, but sometimes it's inconvenient.
